data.title: Schostak Brothers & Company
data.text:
Back to search results

Auburn Hills

Request Information Download Marketing Flyer

Located near Lapeer Rd. and I-75, approx. 110 acres for development is available at the former Palace of Auburn Hills site which was the home of the Detroit Pistons from 1988 to 2017. The property will be developed into the premier Oakland County Class A office/technology/research & development destination.

New construction can be situated in a manner that will maximize both visibility from the interstate and the unique natural environment of the site.

Ideal for any of the following: corporate headquarters, research and development, technology and research, medical, retail, hotel, mixed use.

TENANT ROSTER
